CreateSegment.name: CreateSegment
CreateSegment.description:
Create a segment that is based on endpoint data reported to Pinpoint by your app.
                                                To allow a user to create a segment by importing endpoint data from outside of Pinpoint,
                                                allow the mobiletargeting:CreateImportJob action.
